    version: 0.9

    Cards

    Create layout boxes with different styles.

    Usage

    The Card component is a flexible container composed of the main .card element, with optional .card-title, .card-header, .card-media, .card-content, and card-footer elements. It uses Flexbox internally to support both vertical and horizontal layouts.

    • Preview
    • Markup

    Default

    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

    
									<div class="card width-1-2@m">
										<h3 class="card-title">Default</h3>
										<div class="card-body">
											<p>Lorem ipsum <a href="#!">dolor</a> sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.</p>
										</div>
									</div>

    Available Tokens

    
						--card-bg
						--card-text
						--card-muted-text
						--card-border-radius
						--card-border
						--card-padding
						--card-header-padding
						--card-footer-padding
						--card-title-size
						--card-title-weight
						--card-title-line
						--card-subtitle-size
						--card-subtitle-weight
						--card-badge-size
						--card-badge-bg
						--card-badge-color
						--card-elevation
						--card-hover-shadow

    Hover modifier

    To enable hover interactions on cards, use the data-hover attribute:

    Attribute Description
    data-hover="shadow" Applies a smooth shadow on hover.
    data-hover="lift" Adds a subtle upward movement (translateY(-2px)) and a larger shadow
    • Preview
    • Markup

    Hover

    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.

    
									<div class="card card-hover round width-1-2@m" data-hover='shadow'>
										<h3 class="card-title">Hover</h3>
										<div class="card-body">
											<p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.</p>
										</div>
									</div>

    Elevation Modifiers

    You can manually control a card’s shadow depth using the data-elevation attribute.

    Attribute Description
    data-elevation="xs" Applies a subtle shadow.
    data-elevation="sm" Slightly stronger shadow.
    data-elevation="md" Moderate depth.
    data-elevation="lg" Deep shadow for prominent cards
    data-elevation="xl" Strongest elevation

    Variant Modifiers

    The data-variant attribute allows semantic styling for different card purposes. Each variant maps to a specific elevation level.

    Attribute Description
    data-variant="post" Slight elevation for typical feed items
    data-variant="message" Minimal elevation, often used in inbox views
    data-variant="embed" Medium shadow for embedded widgets
    data-variant="poll" Same as post; intended for interactive cards

    Style Modifiers

    Utility classes to modify the card’s appearance.

    Class Description
    .transparent Removes background and shadow for overlay or glass-like designs.
    .border Applies a subtle border (--card-border) with no shadow, useful for flat UI or minimalist themes.
    • Preview
    • Markup

    Media Top

    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt.

    Media Bottom

    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt.

    
									<div class="grid col-2">
										<div class="card transparent">
											<h3 class="card-title">Media Top</h3>
											<div class="card-body">
												<p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt.</p>
											</div>
										</div>
										<div class="card transparent border round">
											<h3 class="card-title">Media Bottom</h3>
											<div class="card-body">
												<p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt.</p>
											</div>
										</div>
									</div>

    Media Slot

    The card supports flexible media positioning via the card-media class or data-slot="media" attribute. Media can include images, videos, or background elements.

    All positioned media default to object-fit: cover to preserve aspect ratio while filling their container.

    Class Description
    .card-media-top Places media above the card content. Full width. Often used for blog-style headers
    .card-media-bottom Places media below the content. Also full width.
    .card-media-left Aligns media to the left of the content. Typically 40% width; height auto.
    .card-media-right Aligns media to the right of the content. Also 40% width.
    • Preview
    • Markup

    Media Top

    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt.

    Media Bottom

    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt.

    
									<div class="grid col-2">
										<div class="card">
											<div class="card-media card-media-top">
												<img src="/assets/images/photos/image4.webp" alt="Post Media">
											</div>
											<h3 class="card-title">Media Top</h3>
											<div class="card-body">
												<p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt.</p>
											</div>
										</div>
										<div class="card">
											<h3 class="card-title">Media Bottom</h3>
											<div class="card-body">
												<p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt.</p>
											</div>
											<div class="card-media-bottom">
												<img src="/assets/images/photos/image6.webp">
											</div>
										</div>
									</div>

    Video Support

    Use .video class for embedded or inline video content. Sets a fixed aspect-ratio: 16 / 9 and a black background as a fallback.

    Rounded Media (with .round modifier)

    If the card has .round, media will automatically apply border-radius to match the card’s corners based on position.

    Class Description
    .card-media-top Top media: rounds the top corners
    .card-media-bottom Bottom media: rounds the bottom corners
    .card-media-left Left media: rounds the left corners
    .card-media-right Right media: rounds the right corners

    Badge

    A small label typically used to indicate a card’s status, tag, or category (e.g., “New”, “Live”, “Sale”). It is positioned absolutely within the card for clear visibility and styled using card-level design tokens.

    The badge appears in the top-right corner of the card and is designed to be compact and visually distinct. It supports custom background and text color via variables, and ensures consistent alignment and legibility across card variants.

    • Preview
    • Markup

    Default

    NEW

    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

    
									<div class="card width-1-2@m">
										<h3 class="card-title">Default</h3>
										<div class="card-badge">NEW</div>
										<div class="card-body">
											<p>Lorem ipsum <a href="#!">dolor</a> sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.</p>
										</div>
									</div>

    Header & footer

    You can also divide a card into header and footer — around the default body. Just add the .card-header or .card-footer class to a <div> element inside the card.

    .card-header

    The header section of the card, typically used to display an avatar, image, title, and action buttons. It uses flexbox for horizontal alignment and spacing. The avatar supports circular or square shapes. The .content area holds textual information, while .actions contains clickable elements like icons or links.

    .card-body

    The main content area of the card. Uses flexbox column layout with spacing between child elements. Includes specialized styling for poll options with interactive hover states.

    .card-footer

    Footer section designed for secondary actions or information such as buttons, links, or metadata. It uses flexbox with wrapping and various alignment options (left, center, right, between, around). Contains dedicated containers for grouped .actions or .buttons with consistent gaps.

    • Preview
    • Markup
    Title January 01, 2024

    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt.

											</div>

    Horizontal modifier

    .card-horizontal (and [data-layout='horizontal'])

    Enables a horizontal card layout with image/media on the left or right and textual content on the opposite side. The media takes roughly 33% width, and content fills the remaining space. Supports .reverse or data-image="right" modifiers to flip media position.

    • Preview
    • Markup

    Card Title

    This is default layout

    Card Title

    Add class .reverse to right align

    
									<div class="card card-horizontal">
										<div class="card-media">
											<img src="/assets/images/photos/image7.webp" alt="..." />
										</div>
										<div class="card-content">
											<h3>Card Title</h3>
											<p>This is default layout</p>
										</div>
									</div>

									<div class="card card-horizontal reverse margin-large-top">
										<div class="card-media">
											<img src="/assets/images/photos/image7.webp" alt="..." />
										</div>
										<div class="card-content">
											<h3>Card Title</h3>
											<p>Add class <code>.reverse</code> to right align</p>
										</div>
									</div>

    Size modifiers

    Size modifiers for the card, adjusting internal padding to create compact or spacious card variants.

    Class Description
    .card-small reduces padding for tighter layouts.
    .card-large increases padding for more generous spacing.
    .card-dense sets minimal padding for space-constrained environments.
    .card-spacious applies larger padding for airy layouts.
    • Preview
    • Markup

    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

										<div class="first-column">

    Reposts

    [data-variant='repost']

    Special card variant to indicate reposted or quoted content. Adds a colored left border and modifies background styles for distinction

    Link Preview

    .card-link

    Enhanced link preview card with padded content area, border, background, and hover elevation effects. Supports images and meta information such as titles, descriptions, and metadata.

    Upgrade: Moving to stand alone component

    Skeleton loader

    .loading

    Skeleton loader state for the card. Applies a shimmer animation overlay to simulate loading placeholders for header, body, and footer.

    • Preview
    • Markup
    
									<div class="card skeleton">
										<div class="skeleton-block header"></div>
										<div class="skeleton-block body"></div>
										<div class="skeleton-block footer"></div>
									</div>

    Utility classes

    Class Description
    .card-content Card Content Transition. Smooth transition for content changes
    .card-slot Generic Card Slot Padding

    Test Area

    Layout, Show More Pool, Simple Link Preview, and more

											</div>
